text: Which reassurance/warning signs are used? Recognizing the destination is reached: Headings, overview of key content at the top Markers of current location/route monitoring: Bread crumbs/menu markings Traceability: Back/forward buttons (trivial on a S shopping page such as Amazon.com, non- trivial oks at Amazon in web applications and other complex user : tagor interfaces) S L) & . f e
